attributes.action: Ban the company 'Shielas' Wheels' for its sexist remarks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all know that by saying 'men are better drivers' we are being sexist to women. However, their advertisement clearly states 'women make the safest drivers'
  I feel it is totally unfair that this company should be able to get away with this remark, if men should be punished for saying they are better drivers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
